title: Chamber Reacts to Shared Parental Leave Proposals (DNCC - Derbyshire & Nottinghamshire Chamber of Commerce) ...
text: ( Source : DNCC - Derbyshire & Nottinghamshire Chamber of Commerce ) Posted on October 5th , 2015 The Chancellor of the Exchequer has announced that shared parental leave will be extended to include working grandparents. Parental leave , in
